Item.Description:
The camera is in very good condition and takes great pictures. There is a problem with the 18-55mm kit lens that prevents auto-focus from working. All other features work as expected. 

Package includes the camera body the 18-55mm lens, lens cap, lens hood, battery, charger, and shoulder strap, as well as a neoprene sleeve that the camera fits into for protection.
